title: Extending Life Through Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/26/18
itunes:title: Extending Life Through Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/26/18
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and former ABC News science reporter Michael Guillen debate the ethics of current efforts to extend human life through technology, and whether the technology may accidentally wipe out mankind in the future.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
